script.caption: A wide, lush green field scattered with sheep grazing on fresh pasture under the bluest of skies.

dialogue.text: Welcome one and all to the verdant pastures of New Zealand, home to the freshest sheep in the world.

script.caption: Close up on a fluffy sheep, grazing on green grass, seemingly oblivious to the world around it.

dialogue.text: Observe this specimen, handpicked for its remarkable freshness. Fed on the choicest grass, it remains untouched by pollutants common in the rest of the world.
Aye, they're special, our sheep. We pride ourselves on providing them the freshest of diets and utmost care.

script.caption: An animated graphic showing the lifecycle of the grass the sheep eat.

dialogue.text: The secret lies in the nutritious grass that grows here. Every detail, from sourcing seeds to the cycle of growth, is monitored meticulously to maintain the freshness.

script.caption: Farmer Jones, alongside Radke, shearing a sheep with utmost care and precision.

dialogue.text: Even the shearing process is a calculated endeavor, ensuring minimal stress and maximum comfort to the sheep.
That's right. We see it more as an exercise in patience and goodwill rather than a mere harvesting procedure.
